channel.title: Graveyard on Marcin Chmiel
channel.description: Recent content in Graveyard on Marcin Chmiel

item.title: Graveyard
item.description: Automated web scraping service 2018–2020 thedjinn.io was a service that allowed users to select CSS selectors on a website and harvest data and feed them into online charts.

item.title: Graveyard
item.description: MLaaS, or Magic Links as a Service 2019–2020 authmagic.io was a service enabled their users to quickly implement Slack-like magic login links. And a number of other magic (auth) things.

item.title: Distributed highly-available cron service
item.description: Distributed highly-available cron service 2018–2019 Based off of etcd, this was meant to be a highly available, distributed open-source cron implementation. Initially based on a standalone raft algorithm implementation.

item.title: Graveyard
item.description: cheapestflights.world 2017–2019 Born out of passion for affordable traveling, cheapestflights.world was a mailing list where my co-founder and I shared some crazy deals we managed to find.
